data.text: Abiro paki gi chunya duto, yaye Jehova Nyasaye;
Abiro bedo mamor kendo abiro bedo moil kodi;
Wasika dok chien;
Nikech isechungʼna matek ka ichwaka
Isekwero ogendini kendo isetieko joma richo;
Kethruok mosiko osejuko jasigu,
Jehova Nyasaye olocho nyaka chiengʼ,
Obiro ngʼado bura ne piny gi tim makare;
Jehova Nyasaye en kar pondo ne joma idiyo,
Joma ongʼeyo nyingi biro geno kuomi,
Wer wende pak ne Jehova Nyasaye,
Nikech ngʼat machulo kuor kuom remo mochwer siko kaparo;
Neye kaka wasika sanda, yaye Jehova Nyasaye!
mondo anyis pakni
Ogendini oselutore e buche ma gikunyo;
Jehova Nyasaye ongʼere nikech adier mare;
Joma timbegi richo dok e bur matut,
To jochan wiyi ok nowilgo ngangʼ
Aa malo, yaye Jehova Nyasaye, kik iyie mondo dhano olochi;
Gogi gi luoro, yaye Jehova Nyasaye;
